Name: Chroma Blast
About the game: Chroma Blast is a fast paced twin stick shooter with many different styles of play where you fight through waves of enemies while constantly leveling up your ships colorful arsenal. Beat your friends and challenge yourself in the leaderboards, or seek out a true test of skill for those good enough to find it. Features 6 challenging enemies A deadly boss 31 unique weapons Online leaderboards
